note:
My surname is Stone and my chosen name is Bear and there is a slight flaw in my character. Storyteller, speaker to silicon, Geek-to-English 'terp, in the greasy underbelly of the music biz for profit and fun. GQ, ND, filker, cat person. Guerrierus, Alphabet Mafia. Vaxxed and masking. Fix the world, one bit at a time.

Fairly private bear: follow requests required. NO BOTS.
